nodes.name: Sharp
nodes.desc: Dealing DMG with Special Attacks grants Sharp.

nodes.name: Swift Shadow
nodes.desc: Every 50 points of Courage consumed reduces the CD of Spiral Thrust, Breach Pursuit, and Falcon Toss by 1.

nodes.name: Long Lance Sharp Blade
nodes.desc: When Strength reaches 300 points, Expertise Skill damage +7%.

nodes.name: Vulnerable Strike
nodes.desc:
Dealing DMG grants a fixed 30% chance to apply Vulnerability to the enemy.
Vulnerability: Increases the DMG you deal to the target by 10% for 5s.

nodes.name: Divine Concealment
nodes.desc: Consuming Courage increases Haste by 1% and Speed by 2% for 5s, stacking up to 5 times.

nodes.name: Sharp
nodes.desc: When Strength reaches 500 points, the additional ATK from Sharp increases to 6%.

nodes.name: Wind and Thunder Strike
nodes.desc:
When Galeform ends, it applies the Tempestrike.
Every 50 points of Courage consumed during Galeform extends the duration of Tempestrike by 1s.

nodes.name: Skyward Spec
nodes.desc:
Replace Special Attack with Skyfall enhances the skill.
When having Sharp, gains ATK based on the max number of Sharp.

nodes.name: Bird Advancement
nodes.desc:
Increases the Overdrive of Falcon Toss by 1.
Reduces Courage consumed by Falcon Toss by 50%.

nodes.name: Wind Fury
nodes.desc: Casting Sharp Impact grants Wind Fury.

nodes.name: Skyfall
nodes.desc: When dealing DMG, Skyfall gains a fixed 15% chance to grant 1 stack of Sharp.

nodes.name: Kamikaze Luck
nodes.desc:
For each 1 stack of Sharpness consumed, gains 3 points of Courage.
Increases Lucky Hit final DMG by 50%.

nodes.name: Instant Edge Break Style
nodes.desc:
Instant Edge consumes 1 more Sharp.
Increases the DMG dealt by Instant Edge by 90%.

nodes.name: Battle Cry
nodes.desc:
Typhoon Cleave Raises the banner spear, granting Inspire to Allies. Afterward, a follow-up leap can be launched, dealing Attack Damage to the enemies within range and knocking them airborne, while restoring 100 Courage.
Inspire: Lasts for 10s. All Allies gain 10% Haste (Only one effect can be active at a time). You restore 10 Courage per second and 1 Sharpness every 2s.

nodes.name: Spear Penetration
nodes.desc:
When Skyfall lands a Lucky Hit, it triggers Spear Thrust, once every 2s.
Dealing DMG with Spear Thrust restores 8 points of Courage. This effect triggers only once, even if multiple targets are hit.

nodes.name: Pursuit Stance
nodes.desc: When Skyfall deals Crit DMG, it triggers Chasing Step.

nodes.name: Sharp Echo
nodes.desc: If Sharpness isn't at Max stacks, increases the DMG dealt by Skyfall by 25%.

nodes.name: Tornado Dance
nodes.desc: During Wind Fury, DMG dealt by Instant Edge and Azure Sever triggers Tornado (triggered at most once when hitting multiple targets).

nodes.name: Sharp Long Breath
nodes.desc: During Wind Fury, Falcon Toss evolves into Azure Sever once.

nodes.name: Catcher
nodes.desc: In combat, for every enemy defeated that you participated in defeating (effective within a team), increases ATK by 30 for 30s, up to 300.

nodes.name: Exceptional Elegance
nodes.desc: During Galeform, increases the DMG dealt by Instant Edge and Skyfall by 25%.

nodes.name: Wind Swirl Strike
nodes.desc:
Increases the DMG dealt by Tornado by 30%.
Increases the DMG dealt by Spear Thrust by 30%.

nodes.name: Spear Recovery
nodes.desc: Spear Thrust reduces the CD of Falcon Toss by 2s (which can only be triggers once on multiple hits).

nodes.name: Sharp Advancement
nodes.desc:
Enhances the effectiveness of Wind Fury by 50%.
When Instant Edge consumes Chasing Step, doubles the Overdrive effectiveness of Sharp Impact.

nodes.name: Combat Expertise
nodes.desc: You gain bonus ATK continuously as the battle goes on. Every 15s in battle increases your ATK by 2%, up to 8%. The bonus is cleared after the battle ends.

nodes.name: Divine Wind Support
nodes.desc: When Falcon Toss and its enhanced skill (Azure Sever), or Instant Edge hits 1 target, gains a 10% Wind bonus.

nodes.name: Momentum Surge
nodes.desc: Enhances Sharpness by 1%. Every enemy within 5 meters additionally grants 1%, up to 3%.

nodes.name: Instantaneous Crit
nodes.desc: While Chasing Step is active, Instant Edge and Sharp Impact have their critical rate doubled.

nodes.name: Sharp Pursuit
nodes.desc: When Instant Edge consumes Chasing Step, grants 1 stack of Sharp.

nodes.name: Air Dance Strike
nodes.desc:
Sharp Impact and its enhanced skill (Typhoon: Sharp Impact) allow the next Galeform to restore 50% more Courage.
Hitting a target with Sharp Impact and its enhanced skill (Typhoon: Sharp Impact) immediately grants 3 Sharpness (only triggers once even if multiple targets are hit).

nodes.name: Typhoon: Sharp Impact
nodes.desc: Sharp Impact is enhanced, evolving into Typhoon: Sharp Impact.

nodes.name: Instant Edge Combo
nodes.desc: When Instant Edge consumes Chasing Step, grants a fixed 15% chance to deal an extra instance of DMG.

nodes.name: Pursuit Power
nodes.desc: Chasing Step consumed increases Strength by 10%. The effect lasts 10s and stacks up to 2 times.

nodes.name: Break Style
nodes.desc: When dealing Crit DMG, Expertise ignore the targets' 50% Armor.

nodes.name: Vanguard Spec
nodes.desc: Further enhances Gale Thrust. Casting Gale Thrust grants a fixed 20% chance to cause Basic Attacks to evolve into Swift Blade, with an additional 5% chance per layer of Sharpness.

nodes.name: Break Pursuit Advancement
nodes.desc: Within 15s after Casting the Ultimate, Casting Breach Pursuit will not enter CD. This effect is removed after the time ends or after Casting 3 times Breach Pursuit.

nodes.name: Quickshot Meteor
nodes.desc:
Gale Thrust is enhanced, increasing hit counts by 2.
Reduces Gale Thrust's Courage consumption by 20%.

nodes.name: Swift Breeze
nodes.desc: Each 1% Haste accelerates the REG SPD of Courage by 2%.

nodes.name: Strong Attack
nodes.desc: When Valor Cyclone deals DMG, reduces the CD of Ultimate by 0.5s (which can only be triggers once on multiple hits).

nodes.name: Wind Tear
nodes.desc: When Gale Thrust deals DMG, there is a 20% fixed chance to apply Rend.

nodes.name: Wind Chaser
nodes.desc: During the casting of Valor Cyclone, for every 20 points of Courage consumed, increase the DMG of Valor Cyclone by 4%, up to 20%.

nodes.name: Battle Cry
nodes.desc:
Typhoon Cleave Raises the banner spear, granting Inspire to Allies. Afterward, a follow-up leap can be launched, dealing Attack Damage to the enemies within range and knocking them airborne, while restoring 100 Courage.
Inspire: Lasts for 10s. All Allies gain 10% Haste (Only one effect can be active at a time). You restore 10 Courage per second and 1 Sharpness every 2s.

nodes.name: Zephyr Waltz Agility
nodes.desc: Additional Courage recovery: Recovers 1 extra point of Courage per second for every 2 stacks of Sharp.

nodes.name: Fearless Gale
nodes.desc: After Casting Spiral Thrust or Breach Pursuit or Valor Cyclone, the next Gale Thrust will not consume Courage. This effect is removed after leaving combat.

nodes.name: Vigor Spike
nodes.desc: When Sharp is granted, reaching max stacks of Sharp enables Vigor Spike state. Triggers up to once per 30s.

nodes.name: Combat Expertise
nodes.desc: You gain bonus ATK continuously as the battle goes on. Every 15s in battle increases your ATK by 2%, up to 8%. The bonus is cleared after the battle ends.

nodes.name: Rapid Drake Canon
nodes.desc: Using Swift Blade grants it a fixed 10% chance to evolve Basic Attack into Drake Cannon in 10s. Each failure to evolve increases the chance by 10% until success.

nodes.name: Catcher
nodes.desc: In combat, for every enemy defeated that you participated in defeating (effective within a team), increases ATK by 30 for 30s, up to 300.

nodes.name: Wind Spiral
nodes.desc:
When Gale Thrust deals DMG, it has a 25% fixed chance to grant 1 stack of Wind Spiral that lasts 20s and stacks up to 10 times.
Wind Spiral: Casting Spiral Thrust or Valor Cyclone triggers a spiral explosion that inflicts Attack Damage equal to 100% ATK on surrounding enemies. Each explosion consumes 1 stack of Wind Spiral.

nodes.name: Spiral Tear
nodes.desc: Spiral Thrust and Vortex Strike deals 30% more DMG to the targets with Rend.

nodes.name: Whispering Breeze
nodes.desc:
When Courage is below or equal to 50%, reduces the Energy Valor Cyclone consumes by 2.
When Courage is above 50%, increases the DMG Valor Cyclone deals by 12%.

nodes.name: Breath of Wind
nodes.desc: Skills that consume Courage (Spiral Thrust and its enhanced skills, Valor Cyclone, Falcon Toss and its enhanced skills, Gale Thrust) gain 6% Wind Bonus.

nodes.name: Wind Rift Diffusion
nodes.desc: Expertise and Ultimates deal 10% more DMG to targets afflicted with Rend, and can detonate their Rend, spreading it to nearby enemies.

nodes.name: Thousand Wounds
nodes.desc: When Valor Cyclone deals DMG, it has a fixed 50% chance to inflict Rupture.

nodes.name: Momentum Surge
nodes.desc: Enhances Sharpness by 1%. Every enemy within 5 meters additionally grants 1%, up to 3%.

nodes.name: Wind Split Technique
nodes.desc: When Rend deals DMG, it has a fixed 50% chance to grant 2 points of Courage.

nodes.name: Vortex Strike
nodes.desc: After every 2 casts of Drake Cannon, your Spiral Thrust evolves into Vortex Strike.

nodes.name: Wind Gate Drake Cannon
nodes.desc: Every 22 triggers of Valor Cyclone allows Basic Attack to evolve into Drake Cannon in 10s.

nodes.name: Swift Blade
nodes.desc: When Valor Cyclone deals DMG, it has a fixed 7% chance to evolve Basic Attacks into Swift Blade.

nodes.name: Dragon's Fury Flame
nodes.desc:
Doubles the critical rate of Drake Cannon and Vortex Strike.
Increases the Crit DMG dealt by Drake Cannon and Vortex Strike by 8%.

nodes.name: Spiral Flame
nodes.desc: Using Vortext Strike, increases Haste by 25% for 10s.

nodes.name: Fortitude
nodes.desc:
During Valor Cyclone, gains Super Armor and reduces DMG taken by 20%.
When Valor Cyclone deals DMG, restores HP equal to 10% ATK.

nodes.name: Wind Rise
nodes.desc: When Valor Cyclone deals DMG, increases the critical rate of Drake Cannon and Vortex Strike by 7%. The effect lasts 5s and stacks up to 7 times.
